body: This is simply amazing. This story made me feel Happy, Sad, Horny (who could’ve guessed) and it was all just so interesting. And it’s all just beautifully drawn and colored.

She was just desperate and wanted to forget about the MC, she doesn't look like she really loves that guy so I kinda hate it. I know y'all not gonna read this but yeah

This is one of the rare times I comment on things, this is easily one of the best hentai series ever. 1500+ pages and a plot that's so good I didn't even need to jerk off to it to enjoy it. I'd love to think that the ending signifies that this is a autobiography and these are just real (probably stretched truths and different names) events that happened. Fuck, this is probably a 9 even rated against the anime I watch, wow.

Gotta be the longest Hentai I've read yet and I enjoyed every page. Didn't really use for fap material, got so intrigued in the plot. (The actual plot, not "the plot") Was a very good read thanks for making quarantine not as boring.

i never comment on hentai sites but this was more than jerk off material, this is a masterpiece of a hentai.
got so invested in the characters and the story that the imaginary NTR stuff (which i usually dont care about in hentais) really made my body feel an emotion im not used to and i dont like to feel, my hands are still shaking from that and i need to rest cuz my heart is pounding.

all of this to say, this is an incredible story so far and really exceeds expectations.
first time i read an hentai without wanting to jerk off cuz im so invested in the actual plot!
Yea the NTR made my junior flop but I mean at least most of it was just imagination. I can live with that.
Coulda shortened the NTR bit because my heart was really hurting and I was tearing up that I decided to skip the whole thing. 9.8/10
I'll allow it. 10/01 and thats not a typo.
Man, this is simply the best. 👍
My only solace from all the NTR I have read, thank you very much author-san, thank you.
I also like the hopeful vibe that in the end these characters get the partner that they deserve, it really makes he hopeful to get a gf in the future
